skills.name: Read an integer on a scale where the required measurement is marked by a number
Select appropriate tools to measure lengths (US)

explanations.A: A pencil is about 8 inches or 20 cm long, so a ruler is the most sensible tool. The others are much longer than needed for a pencil.
explanations.B: A pencil is about 8 inches or 20 cm long, so a yard stick is much longer than we need... Which tool is good for small measurements?
explanations.C: A pencil is about 8 inches or 20 cm long, so a meter stick is much longer than we need... Which tool is good for small measurements?
explanations.D: A pencil is about 8 inches or 20 cm long, so a measuring tape is much longer than we need... Which tool is good for small measurements?

explanations.A: A ruler is very short compared to the length of a football field, so it would be hard to measure it accurately... Which tool is best for long distances?
explanations.B: A football field is measured in yards, but it would be hard to measure it accurately one yard at a time. Which tool is good for long distances?
explanations.C: We could measure the field in meters, but it would be hard to measure it accurately one meter at a time with a meter stick. Which tool is good for long distances?
explanations.D: Measuring tape is best for long distances, as it measures more than one meter/yard at a time. You could get the most accurate measurement of a football field by using this tool.

explanations.C: We could measure the bus in meters, but it would be hard to measure it accurately one meter at a time with a meter stick. Which tool is good for long distances?
explanations.D: Measuring tape is best for long distances, as it measures more than one meter/yard at a time. You could get the most accurate measurement of a bus by using this tool.
